name: amenity
description:
The amenity command extracts amenity features from OSM data. Amenities include restaurants, banks, hospitals, schools, and many other points of interest.

Supports filtering by amenity type and other tags.

options.-t, --type: Amenity type to extract (can be repeated, e.g., --type restaurant --type cafe)
options.-c, --category: Filter by category: food, education, health, transport, finance, worship, civic
options.--list-types: List all amenity types found in file

output:
GeoJSON with properties:
- id: OSM ID
- amenity: Amenity type
- name: Feature name
- opening_hours: Operating hours
- phone, website, email: Contact info
- addr:*: Address fields
- wheelchair: Accessibility info
